attributes.action: Ensure That The Public Will Never Be Subjected To Any Kind Of Human Micro-Chipping
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A Petition That ,The Public Will Never Be Subjected To Any Kind Of Human, Micro-Chipping  Device Implants, Such As The Veri Chip, Or ANY Other type of Tracking Device, Which Would Ultimately Take Away Our Civil Liberties.
